annotation.TEXT: The Staff of Striking is...okay, I guess? It's basically a rapid melee attack that you can use over and over again so long as you have magic. I never really found a use for it anywhere, aside from maybe being helpful for getting the "Defend the Lab" achievement (which you get by not destroying any of the blocks during the Shovel Knight battle).

If I could take a moment to vent on something real quick... *ahem* - To hell with these particular enemies, and to hell with any similar enemy-type. Seriously, what is the purpose behind the "Propeller Meanies" other than to piss you off? In that regard, their names are rather appropriate.
